item.title: Scratch in 2021
item.description: Never thought that I will say that - but visual programming is cool! üí™ What is Visual Programming? So, visual programming is special approach where instead of writing code by your hands in a form of text written in specific syntax, you just drag & drop special boxes onto a form. In the end, your “tower” comprised of many boxes represent some algorithm that will be executed by some engine in runtime.
